¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> he came <S%G1831>out<s%>, and <S%G4198>went<s%>, <S%G2596>as<s%> he was <S%G1485>wont<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
